name: Send Dripify leads to Holded contacts and companies
description: This workflow seamlessly integrates Dripify leads with Holded contacts and companies, ensuring a smooth transfer of valuable customer information. By automating this process, businesses can save time and effort, while maintaining complete control over the source code to customize and optimize the workflow according to their specific needs. This integration eliminates the hassle of manual data entry and allows for a more efficient and tailored approach to managing customer relationships.
